pages.text: $(9)Current HP Damage$() is a type of on-hit damage.  Every hit, you will deal a percentage of the target's current health as additional damage.$(p)This stat is only found on heavy weapons.

$(9)$(n)Base Value:$() 1$(p)$(9)$(n)Max Value:$() 1024$(p)Note: A value of 1.0 is actually 0% current hp damage, but if the base was zero, percentage modifiers would have no effect, and flat modifiers don't convey the bonus correctly.
